text: Family Dollar is an American variety store chain in the United States. Family Dollar is headquartered in Matthews, a suburb of Charlotte, North Carolina. The chain employs 1,400 people. Family Dollar Distribution Center in Matthews, North Carolina is the largest facility in the Family Dollar chain of stores in the United States. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:1959 establishments in the United States
title: Family Dollar
